page.title: 08Hamble again three
page.content:
and shop are part of the shore part of the marina.
Yacht servicing, chandlery and brokerage are also provided and a caravan park is situated just up the hill.
Port Hamble Marina has 314 berths, the same facilities(without the shop) an Ancaster Marine office, Boat showroom and storage and repair sheds.It also provides the 'Square Rigger' Yacht Club. Moody's Boat yard and marina at swanick,just before the bridge,also offers many facilities and services and is the home of the family cruising boats and fast deep sea grenadier cruising yachts.A.H.Moody & Son limited are also famous due to the yacht 'Drum' belonging to popstar
